title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 52-6.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 52-6.1 - Definitions

State Regulations

For the purposes of this Subpart, unless the context indicates otherwise, the following terms shall have the following meanings: (a) Skin donor means a human being, living or dead, who is the source of skin tissue including autogeneic tissue for transplantation. (b) Transplantation means the grafting of skin from a donor to a recipient, including the grafting of skin that has been manipulated and integrated into an artificial skin substitute, and the grafting of skin from an autogenic donor. Notes

52-6.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
